PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordem venda origem
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CM_ORDEMVENDAITENS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT OVI.HANDLE FROM CM_ORDEMVENDAITENS OVI JOIN CP_ORDEMCOMPRAORDEMVENDA OCOV ON OVI.HANDLE = OCOV.ORDEMVENDAITEM WHERE OCOV.ORDEMCOMPRAITEM = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1944_at6853_hs2f91a2d2.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisição item
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_CP_REQUISICOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>HANDLE IN (SELECT A.REQUISICAOHANDLE FROM CP_REQUISICAOAGRUPADAS A, CP_REQUISICAOCOTACOES B WHERE A.REQUISICAOPRODUTO = B.COTACAO AND B.HANDLE IN (SELECT COTACAO FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS WHERE HANDLE = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS)))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t868_at1477_hs382e043.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>

PageWidgetPortable.Title: Requisições de aquisição
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_LC_REQUISICOES.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>A.HANDLE IN (SELECT D.HANDLE FROM CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS E, LC_AQUISICAOITENS B, LC_REQUISICAOITENS C, LC_REQUISICOES D WHERE E.HANDLE = @RASTRO(CP_ORDENSCOMPRAITENS) AND E.AQUISICAOITEM = B.HANDLE AND B.REQUISICAOITEM = C.HANDLE AND C.REQUISICAO = D.HANDLE)</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1792_at2594_hsac0a4723.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
